name: What Is Underwater
description:
What is underwater is a third-person survival game in which the player takes on the role of a diver who has strayed into the world of the deep ocean and needs to escape from giant unknown monsters and survive for as long as possible. Unfortunately, the monsters' attacks will also become increasingly deadly.

CONTROLS

Use WASD to move, L to pause

Try to survive as long as you can!

Highly recommend to start the game in full screen!
